message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. It's a one-time opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I've done my research and I believe that's a fair price for this product.

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm afraid $1200000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1300000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. However, $1250000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $1280000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can wrap up the deal here.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1220000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle here.

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more serious concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1290000. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
